# Workset

> Workset is a Go CLI for managing multi-repo workspaces with linked Git worktrees.

This site documents Workset. Start with the overview and Getting Started, then use the reference pages for commands and configuration.

## Start here

- [Home](https://workset.dev/)
- [Getting Started](https://workset.dev/getting-started/)
- [Concepts](https://workset.dev/concepts/)

## Reference

- [CLI Overview](https://workset.dev/cli/)
- [Command Index](https://workset.dev/commands/)
- [Config](https://workset.dev/config/)
- [Templates](https://workset.dev/templates/)
- [Releases](https://workset.dev/releases/)

## Optional

- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/strantalis/workset): source code and issues
